name: Authentic Thai Green Curry Paste Recipe
description: An authentic Thai green curry paste recipe that's easy-to-make at home with fresh herbs and spices.

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice all your ingredients to make them easier to pound later on.
recipeInstructions.name: Thinly slice all your ingredients to make them easier to pound later on.

recipeInstructions.text: Give the black peppercorns, coriander seeds, and cumin a quick roast to amp up the flavors.
recipeInstructions.name: Give the black peppercorns, coriander seeds, and cumin a quick roast to amp up the flavors.

recipeInstructions.text: Crush the dry ingredients first - salt, lemongrass, galangal, and your freshly roasted spices. Crush them down to a fine mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Crush the dry ingredients first - salt, lemongrass, galangal, and your freshly roasted spices. Crush them down to a fine mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the rest of your ingredients. Keep pounding until everything melds into a smooth, fine paste.
